strategy_reasoning: Using the 'digital garden' metaphor fits our brand perfectly. The switch from Cloudflare cron to GitHub Actions is technical, but visually representing it as a reliable 'watering/refill' system in a Stardew Valley style makes it understandable and cozy. The removal of 'Turbo' and secret standardization is framed as 'inventory management' or 'spring cleaning', which is satisfying and relatable to gamers.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit automated watering system tending to a row of glowing digital flowers. The water is glowing golden (pollen). Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'AUTO REFILLS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
images.description: Visualizes the new GitHub Actions workflow for tier refills as an automated garden system.

images.prompt: Close up pixel art of a retro RPG inventory screen. A pixel cursor is organizing shiny golden keys (secrets) and removing a grayed-out item labeled 'Turbo'. Pastel peach and mint background. 8-bit UI elements, clean lines. Cozy, organized vibe like Unpacking. Warm lighting. Text: 'INVENTORY CLEANUP'.
images.description: Represents the removal of the Turbo model and standardization of API keys/secrets.
